title: Good but anonomous
text: This is one of many similar looking motels on Lombard street. It's convenient for the excellent MUNI public transport system, but please don't think you are near the famous "Twisty" bit of Lombard St. That's miles away.The service was good though with both the people I met on the front desk very helpful. Breakfast is machine coffee, machine juice and muffins. Think of it as a snack, not a way to start your day.Parking is first come first served but I never saw it full. I left mine parked there for 3 days to avoid parking fees elsewhere in city.
